title: Namatjira the painter (A)
creator_credit: Stanley Hawes, Ralph Foster and Australian National Film Board
brief_description: Traces the life and artistic development of the Aboriginal painter, the late Albert Namatjira. His environment, his introduction to painting, his subsequent success with beautifully original landscapes and his influence on fellow Aborigines are recorded. [Rev. ed. 007430]
creator_credit_for_label: Stanley Hawes, Ralph Foster and Australian National Film Board
